description: Unique system identifier for a navigation tree configuration record.
Business key naming the navigation tree or role-based profile controlling menus and permissions; likely maps to user roles; confirm with SME.
User-facing label describing the navigation tree/profile shown in the application.
Indicator that this configuration is the default applied when no specific selection exists.
Identifier of the account that created the record for audit tracking.
Timestamp when the record was first created.
Identifier of the account that last updated the record for audit tracking.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the record.
